import React ,{useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "../index.css"; import axios from 'axios'; import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const productList = useSelector(state=> state.productList); const { products, loading , error } = productList; const disptach = useDispatch(); //fetching data from server useEffect(()=>{ disptach(listProducts()); return ()=>{ }; },[]) console.log(props.match.params.id) const product = products.find(x=>x._id === props.match.params.id); return (
